topics.author: 53f29d1b6368725f76ba0100

topics.body: Okay, so me and granddad went to see Antman. And I noticed something weird. He was wearing a thin silver chain around his neck. Well I learned that he has actually ordered for himself, and I am nit joking, a motherfucking PINKIE RING. Shaped like a skeleton hand! Unfortunately the box he got didn't contain the ring but only the complementary chain. So I asked him if I could see it. He takes it off and I put it on and ask him how it looks. He looks at me with a completely straight face and says "Looks kinds gay on you." So then I ask him "Wait does the chain make ME look gay or do I make IT look gay." To which his only response was "Yes." Then we proceeded to cackle like idiots for five minutes.
topics.author: 4fde4618945b700aa0002fff
